name: The Rustbucket Scrapyard
description:
A canyon filled with the rusted detritus of an ancient war machine graveyard. The air is filled with the sound of clanging metal and manic, high-pitched laughter. A goblin clan has taken up residence and is building something dangerous.

Engage Region Action

You move in to investigate the disturbance. Draw the next card from this Region Deck: 'Scouting the Perimeter'.

name: Scouting the Perimeter
description:
Goblin patrols are guarding the entrance to the main junk piles. You need to clear a path before you can venture deeper.

Objective

Secure an entrance to the scrapyard.

Journey

Make a Journey Roll to navigate the razor-sharp scrap metal surrounding the camp. Your destination is the 'Scrap Heap Ambush' Location Card.

Progression

Upon arriving, begin a Timed Scene using the 'Scrap Heap Ambush' card for setup.

name: Scrap Heap Ambush
description:
A narrow, 8x12 path winds through towering piles of unstable, rusted metal. Goblins lie in wait among the junk.

Setup

  • Map: 8x12 grid. All squares in columns 1, 2, 7, and 8 are difficult terrain (Junk Piles).
  • Enemies: Place 2 'Goblin Stabber' creatures at C8 and F8. Place 1 'Goblin Net-Trapper' at D10.
  • Players: Start on any square in row 1.

Objective

Defeat all enemies.

Progression

Once all enemies are defeated, draw the next card from this Region Deck: 'The Boom Gate'.

name: Goblin Stabber
description:
A scrawny goblin with a rusty shank and a nasty grin.

Shank(Active) Melee attack. Deals HD damage. If the target is adjacent to another goblin, deals +2 damage.

name: Goblin Net-Trapper
description:
Stays at range, trying to entangle foes with weighted nets.

Throw Net(Active) Ranged attack. Target must Defy Danger (DEX) or become Immobilized for 1 round.

name: The Boom Gate
description:
You've reached the entrance to the main workshop, but it's blocked by a reinforced gate rigged with erratic gnomish explosives the goblins scavenged.

Objective

Bypass the trapped gate.

Progression

Begin a Timed Scene. Use the 'Rigged Entrance' Location Card for setup.

name: Rigged Entrance
description:
A 6x6 area in front of a large metal gate (Wall along row 6). A complex, ticking explosive device is strapped to the center (üîç at C6, D6).

Disarm the Bomb

An adjacent character can use an Action to Investigate. Roll+INT (to disarm) or Roll+DEX (to pry it off quickly).
On a 16+: You disarm the device and the gate swings open.
On a 9-15: You trigger a small charge. You take 1d6 fire damage, but the gate blows open.
Peril (1-8): Massive explosion! All characters in the scene take 2d6 fire damage. The gate is destroyed.

Progression

Once the gate is open, discard this card and draw the next card: 'Boss: The Scrap Titan'.

name: Boss: The Scrap Titan
description:
Inside the workshop, Chief Sparkfizzle sits atop a massive, hulking construct made of welded scrap metal, boiler plates, and spinning gears. "You're just in time to test my masterpiece!" he cackles.

Objective

Defeat Chief Sparkfizzle and his Scrap Titan.

Progression

Begin a Timed Scene. Use the 'Main Assembly Floor' Location Card for setup.

name: Main Assembly Floor
description:
A large, open 12x12 workshop littered with tools and oil stains.

Setup

  • Enemies: Place 'The Scrap Titan' (Boss) at G6 (it occupies a 2x2 space: G6, H6, G7, H7). Place 2 'Goblin Stabbers' at C4 and J4.
  • Players: Start on any square in row 12.

Progression

When 'The Scrap Titan' is defeated, draw the final card: 'Scrapyard Salvage'.

name: The Scrap Titan
description:
A towering, piloted mech made of rusted iron, venting steam and oil.

Boss Creature: Draw 1 random Gold and 1 random Red Feature card and attach them.

Heavy Plating(Passive) Reduces all incoming physical damage (HD) by 2.
Steam Vent(Active) All adjacent characters must Defy Danger (DEX) or take 1d6 MD fire damage and be Pushed 1.
Crushing Claw(Active) Melee attack. Deals HD damage. On a critical hit, the target is Stunned for 1 round.

name: Scrapyard Salvage
description:
With the Titan destroyed and Chief Sparkfizzle fleeing, the remaining goblins scatter. You rifle through the workshop, finding a stash of stolen coins and a peculiar piece of technology.

Reward

The party receives 200 gold total. You find the 'Overclocked Goggles' rare item.

Progression

You have completed this region's story. If this Region Deck had a Key Token on it, you now claim it. Discard all remaining cards in this deck. You may now travel or engage another region.

name: Overclocked Goggles
description:
Brass goggles with multiple spinning lenses that whir softly. They analyze weaknesses in real-time.

Target Analysis

When you use the Volley action, you can spend 1 MP. If you do, roll with advantage. If the attack is a High Hit (16+), it ignores 2 points of the target's Armor.
